Interface AdminServiceInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminService

    public interface AdminServiceInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void approveStudentRegistration(Student student)
      call studentDAO to set student attribute registrationApproved to true

      • createCourse

        void createCourse(Course course)
        call courseDAO to create a course

      • createProfessor

        void createProfessor(Professor professor)
              throws UsernameUsedException
        call professorDAO to create a professor
        Parameters:
        professor - the professor to create
        Throws:
        UsernameUsedException - if username already exists

      • updateCourse

        void updateCourse(Course course)
           throws CourseNotFoundException
        call courseDAO to update a course
        Parameters:
        course - the course updated
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - if courseID provided doesn't exist

      • deleteCourse

        void deleteCourse(int courseId)
           throws CourseNotFoundException
        call courseDAO to delete a course
        Parameters:
        courseId - the course to delete
        Throws:
        CourseNotFoundException - if courseID provided doesn't exist

      • listAllCourse

        java.util.List<Course> listAllCourse()
        call courseDAO to view all course
        Returns:
        Returns a list of courses

      • approveStudentRegistration

        void approveStudentRegistration(Student student)
                         throws StudentNotFoundException
        call studentDAO to set student attribute registrationApproved to true
        Parameters:
        student - the student to approve
        Throws:
        StudentNotFoundException - if student provided doesn't exist

      • getAdminByUsername

        Admin getAdminByUsername(java.lang.String username)
        call adminDAO to get admin by username
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        Returns:
        Returns an admin

      • unregisteredStudent

        java.util.List<Student> unregisteredStudent()
                                     throws AllStudentRegisteredException
        call studentDAO to get list of students that are not registered yet
        Returns:
        list of students
        Throws:
        AllStudentRegisteredException - if list is empty

      • getStudentById

        Student getStudentById(int studentId)
                throws StudentNotFoundException
        call studentDAO to get student by id
        Parameters:
        studentId - the id of the student
        Returns:
        student if is not found then returns null
        Throws:
        StudentNotFoundException - if student was not found
